ARABIC: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then on the Day of Rising you will argue in the presence of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then on the Day of Resurrection you will dispute before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then eventually all of you will contend before your Lord on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then, on the Day of Judgment, all of you will present your disputes before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then you will dispute before your Lord on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will be disputing before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then surely on the day of resurrection you will contend one with another before. your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then on the Day of Resurrection before your Lord you shall dispute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord ye will dispute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and, then on the Day of Resurrection you shall place your dispute before your Sustainer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord ye shall contend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then on the Day of Resurrection you will contend before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In the end will ye (all), on the Day of Judgment, settle your disputes in the presence of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will be disputing before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then, on the Day of Resurrection, you shall dispute before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will be quarrelling before your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:31] Then you will indeed, O mankind, concerning the injustices you committed towards one another, be contending before your Lord on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then lo! on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord ye will dispute) i.e. the Prophet (pbuh) and the chieftains of the disbelievers will present their proof against each other.
